org.jepria.versionizer

Interface SearchOverviewFilesAction.UserInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommonUserInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLUI
    Enclosing class:
    SearchOverviewFilesAction

    public static interface SearchOverviewFilesAction.UserInterface
    Simple, low-level (uses primitive types for communication) user interface

      • sof_optOverviewAutoGenerate

        int sof_optOverviewAutoGenerate(java.lang.String overviewPath)
        When overview.html not found in the module, ask whether to auto-generate overview file, create manually or skip searching overviews in the module
        Parameters:
        overviewPath - suggested path for generating/creating missing overview file
        Returns:
        1: auto-generate; 2: user creates overview file manually; else: skip searching overviews in the module

      • sof_reqGenerateOverviewManually

        void sof_reqGenerateOverviewManually()
        Request (and wait) the user to create the overview file manually

        Message found multiple overview files

      • sof_optRecoverErrorOrSkip

        int sof_optRecoverErrorOrSkip()
        When error occured, ask whether to recover the error manually or skip searching overviews in the module
        Returns:
        1: recover manually; else: skip searching overviews in the module

      • sof_reqRecoverError

        void sof_reqRecoverError()
        Request (and wait) the user to recover the error manually
